mapper.select: SELECT E.REQNUM,E.MICODE,D.MINAME,E.MRREQAM,E.MRSTATUS FROM MATREQ E JOIN MATINFO D ON E.MICODE=D.MICODE WHERE E.MRSTATUS ='발주전'
SELECT CSCODE, CSNAME, CSNUM,CSTEL FROM COSTOMER WHERE CSGB='자재거래'
SELECT CSCODE, CSNAME, CSNUM, CSTEL FROM COSTOMER WHERE CSNAME LIKE '%' || #{csname} || '%' AND CSGB='자재거래'
SELECT MICODE,MINAME,MISTAND,MIUNIT FROM MATINFO WHERE MINAME LIKE '%' || #{miname} || '%'

SELECT O.MOSTATUS,O.MONUM,O.REQNUM,O.MOODATE,O.MICODE,O.CSCODE,C.CSNAME,M.MINAME,O.MOASKAM FROM MATORD O,COSTOMER C,MATINFO M WHERE (O.MICODE=M.MICODE AND C.CSCODE=O.CSCODE) AND (O.CSCODE = #{cusCode}) AND (O.MICODE = #{matCode}) AND (O.MOODATE BETWEEN #{startD} AND #{endD})
SELECT MICODE,MINAME, (SELECT CSNAME FROM COSTOMER WHERE CSCODE = #{cusCode}) AS CSNAME ,#{cusCode} AS CSCODE FROM MATINFO WHERE MICODE= #{matCode}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO MATORD VALUES (('MO-'||matord_MONUM_seq.nextval), #{micode}, #{cscode}, #{reqnum , jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE , #{mrreqam , jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moaskam}, '발주중', #{monote , jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select 'MO-'||max(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(monum,4))) as monum from matord
mapper.select: SELECT O.MOODATE,O.MONUM,O.MOASKAM,O.MOSTATUS,O.MONOTE, C.CSNAME,M.MINAME,o.reqnum ,o.mrreqam,o.cscode FROM MATORD O ,COSTOMER C, MATINFO M WHERE (O.MICODE = M.MICODE AND C.CSCODE=O.CSCODE ) AND O.MONUM= #{monum}

SELECT E.MONUM,E.MOODATE,E.MOASKAM,E.MICODE,E.CSCODE,D.MINAME,D.MISTAND,D.MIUNIT,Z.CSNAME FROM MATORD E , MATINFO D ,COSTOMER Z WHERE (E.MICODE=D.MICODE AND E.CSCODE=Z.CSCODE) AND (E.MOODATE BETWEEN #{startD} AND #{endD}) AND E.MOSTATUS='발주중'

SELECT S.MSINDATE,S.MSNUM,S.MLNUM,S.MSINAM, O.MONUM,O.MOODATE,O.MOASKAM, M.MINAME,M.MISTAND,M.MIUNIT, C.CSNAME FROM MATSAR S,MATORD O,MATINFO M,COSTOMER C WHERE (S.MONUM = O.MONUM AND O.MICODE=M.MICODE AND O.CSCODE=C.CSCODE) AND S.MSSTAT='입고' AND (O.CSCODE = #{cusCode}) AND (S.MSINDATE BETWEEN #{startD} AND #{endD})
SELECT S.MATNUM,S.MICODE,S.MSCIAM,M.MINAME,m.misafe FROM MATSTK S, MATINFO M WHERE S.MICODE=M.MICODE ORDER BY S.MATNUM
SELECT S.MATNUM,S.MICODE,S.MSCIAM,M.MINAME,m.misafe FROM MATSTK S, MATINFO M WHERE (S.MICODE=M.MICODE) AND S.MICODE=#{matCode}
SELECT M.MSNUM,M.PCNUM,M.MSOUTDATE,M.MSOUTAM, M.MICODE,A.MINAME,A.MISTAND,A.MIUNIT FROM MATSAR M,MATINFO A WHERE m.micode = a.micode and M.MSSTAT ='출고'

SELECT M.MSNUM,M.PCNUM,M.MSOUTDATE,M.MSOUTAM, M.MICODE,A.MINAME,A.MISTAND,A.MIUNIT FROM MATSAR M,MATINFO A WHERE M.MICODE = A.MICODE AND M.MSSTAT ='출고' AND (M.MICODE = #{matCode}) AND (M.MSOUTDATE BETWEEN #{startD} AND #{endD})
SELECT S.MICODE AS "자재코드",M.MINAME AS "자재명",m.misafe AS "안전재고" ,S.MSCIAM AS "현재고" FROM MATSTK S, MATINFO M WHERE S.MICODE=M.MICODE ORDER BY S.MATNUM

SELECT O.MOSTATUS AS "발주상태",O.MONUM AS "발주코드",O.REQNUM AS "요청번호",O.MRREQAM AS "발주요청량", TO_CHAR(O.MOODATES) AS "발주일자",C.CSNAME AS "발주업체",M.MINAME AS "자재명",O.MOASKAM AS "주문수량",O.MONOTE AS "비고" FROM MATORD O,COSTOMER C,MATINFO M WHERE (O.MICODE=M.MICODE AND C.CSCODE=O.CSCODE)
